org.openlaszlo.lzproject.rest
Class RestServiceResult

java.lang.Object
  org.openlaszlo.lzproject.rest.RestServiceResult

public class RestServiceResult
extends java.lang.Object

The classs RestServiceResult represents the result of a REST service call.

The RestServiceResult contains a localized message passed to the response JSP page and JDBC SQL states in case of SQL errors.

Author:
raju
